itunes:title: Episode 771 - Texas Turbine Massacre
title: Episode 771 - Texas Turbine Massacre
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Dan Hollaway is joined by mediocre Ross Patterson replacement Rob Fox to talk about the winter storm that has crippled our current home state of Texas, the sh*tty responses from Texas politicians, and how stupid it is that such a underwhelming storm dest...
itunes:summary:
Dan Hollaway is joined by mediocre Ross Patterson replacement Rob Fox to talk about the winter storm that has crippled our current home state of Texas, the sh*tty responses from Texas politicians, and how stupid it is that such a underwhelming storm destroyed a whole state -- plus Jarred Taylor calls in but has to leave after his water main exploded live on air.

description:
Dan Hollaway is joined by mediocre Ross Patterson replacement Rob Fox to talk about the winter storm that has crippled our current home state of Texas, the sh*tty responses from Texas politicians, and how stupid it is that such a underwhelming storm destroyed a whole state -- plus Jarred Taylor calls in but has to leave after his water main exploded live on air.
